function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;

var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;

function trim(input) {

Mancala is one of the world’s oldest and best-loved games, and Pressman’s folding wooden Mancala board offers an affordable way to play that makes a great travel game as well as a wonderful home edition. Players take turns scooping up the special stones and counting them out one at a time into the pockets on the board. When they drop a stone into an empty pocket on their side of the board, they capture all the stones in the opposite pocket. It sounds like a simple marble game, but it’s got plenty of strategy and reinforces STEM skills like counting and strategic planning. The winner is the player who collects the most stones! This folding Mancala includes a hinged wooden playing board, 48 plastic stones, and complete instructions.
Invented thousands of years ago, Mancala is one of the world’s favorite games of counting and strategy
Hinged wooden board folds for easy storage, making it a great choice for home and travel
Reinforces STEM and STEAM skills
Tested for safety and quality
For 2 players, ages 6 and up


Read more


Mancala Wooden Folding Set by Pressman, Ages 6 and Up, 2 Players

Mancala is one of the world’s oldest and best-loved games. Players take turns scooping up the special stones and counting them out one at a time into the pockets on the board. When they drop a stone into an empty pocket on their side of the board, they capture all the stones in the opposite pocket. The player who collects the most stones wins!




Easy to learn gameplay

This classic game with simple rules is loved by kids and adults alike! Players drop stones into pockets on the board as they try to capture the stones in their opponent’s pockets to win!

Reinforces STEM skills

Mancala sounds like a simple marble game, but it’s got plenty of strategy and reinforces STEM skills like counting and strategic planning.

Great for home and travel

The folding wooden board easily stores all pieces in a convenient compact size, making this a great choice for home or travel.

Read more

Mancala – Wooden Folding Set Mancala for Kids Mexican Train Dominoes Family Classics Chess Mastermind
Description In this game of strategy, players scoop up stones and count them out one at a time into the pockets on the board. Drop a stone into an empty pocket on your side to capture all the stones in the opposite pocket. Collect the most stones to win! Now kids can enjoy the classic game of Mancala in this special edition where the gemstones are replaced with cute plastic animals! With just a few easy rules to follow, the object is to collect the most animals by the end of the game to win. Introduce your family to a new way to play the old classic game of dominoes! Play all the dominoes from your hand onto one or more chains, or “trains,” leading from a central hub. Can’t play? Use the colorful trains to mark the end of your turn. This is the perfect chess set to add to your family game collection and is great for both beginners and experienced players. This set includes a folding chess board and full-size Staunton chess pieces, which features a 2.63″ King. It’s Codemaker vs. Codebreaker to find who will be the Mastermind! The Codemaker creates a secret code. The Codebreaker tries to match the code using logic, deduction and a little bit of luck. Can you crack the code in 10 moves or less?
Minimum Age 6+ 6+ 6+ 8+ 8+
Minimum Players 2 2 1 2 2
Maximum Players 2 2 8 2 2

It’s fun, it’s challenging, it’s exciting, it’s SEQUENCE! Play a card from your hand, and place a chip on a corresponding space on the game board. When you have five in a row, it’s a SEQUENCE. Learn to block your opponents or remove their chips, and watch out for the Jacks – they’re wild! With a little strategy and luck, you’ll be a winner. Includes 1 Folding Game Board, 2 Decks of SEQUENCE Playing Cards, 135 playing chips: 35 red, 50 blue and 50 green, and Complete Instructions For 2-12 players, ages 7 and up.
Play a card from your hand, and place a chip on a corresponding space on the game board – when you have five in a row, its a SEQUENCE
Each player or team tries to score the required number of five-card SEQUENCES before their opponents
Easy enough for children, challenging for adults!
Exciting gameplay develops STEM skills like strategy
Includes 1 Folding Game Board, 2 Decks of SEQUENCE Playing Cards, 135 Playing Chips (50 Green, 50 Blue, 35 Red), and Complete Instructions
For 2-12 players, ages 7 and up

SEQUENCE Contents:

Folding Game Board, 2 Decks of SEQUENCE Playing Cards, 135 Playing Chips, Complete Instructions

SEQUENCE by Goliath

Ages 7 and up, 2-12 players

It’s fun, it’s challenging, it’s exciting, it’s SEQUENCE! Play a card from your hand, and place a chip on a corresponding space on the game board. When you have five in a row, it’s a SEQUENCE. Learn to block your opponents or remove their chips, and watch out for the Jacks – they’re wild! With a little strategy and luck, you’ll be a winner.

  • This exciting game of strategy is fun for the whole family
  • Great for individual or team play
  • Easy enough for kids and challenging enough for adults

Read more

Playing with SEQUENCE

Develops STEM skills like strategy

Players select a card of their choice from their hand and place it face up on a discard pile. Then they place a chip on the corresponding space on the board. Each card is pictured twice on the game board, so choose your space wisely!

Jacks add excitement to gameplay!

Jacks with two eyes are wild and can be used to place a chip on any space on the board. A one-eyed Jack can be played to remove an opponent’s chip from the board. Keep in mind, you cannot remove a chip from a completed SEQUENCE.

Winning the game

The first player or team to score the required number of five-card SEQUENCES wins the game. It’s fun, it’s challenging, it’s exciting – it’s SEQUENCE!

Read more




SEQUENCE
Jumbo SEQUENCE Tube Game
SEQUENCE for Kids
SEQUENCE Letters
SEQUENCE Dice Game
Description Play a card from your hand, and place a chip on a corresponding space on the game board. When you have five in a row, its a SEQUENCE. Block your opponents or remove their chips. The first player or team with the required number of SEQUENCES wins! It’s the classic game of SEQUENCE jumbo-sized! The game includes a 32″ x 27″ durable cushioned playing mat which provides easy viewing thats perfect for large groups and parties! The tube offers convenient storage for future gameplay. It’s the exciting game of SEQUENCE just for kids! Play an animal card from your hand, and place your chip on the corresponding animal on the board. The first player with four chips in a row wins! Reading is not required to play. Players sound out the letter on their cards, match it to the beginning sound of a picture on the game board, then place a chip there. Colored squares on the cards and game board help with faster letter recognition. Get 4 in a row for a SEQUENCE to win! It’s the strategic game of SEQUENCE as an easy to play dice game! Roll the dice and place a chip on a corresponding number on the game board. Get 5 chips in a row and you win! The dice add a fun twist to the game that your whole family will enjoy!
Minimum Age 7+ 7+ 3+ 4+ 7+
Minimum Players 2 2 2 2 2
Maximum Players 12 12 4 4 4

The Franklin Sports Mini Soccer goal set is the perfect all in one set for any young soccer player! This set comes with the Mini folding soccer goal, Mini Soccer ball, and inflation pump so you’ll have everything you need to get the game started. Plus the lightweight PVC construction makes this set easy to take on the go so you can play inside, outside, or anywhere else! The goal folds flat for easy and convenient storage when not in use. Get your young soccer fan in the game today.
All in one set: This set includes (1) 36 inches x 24 inches x 24 inches mini soccer net, (1) mini soccer ball, and an inflation pump with needle so you have everything you need to play
Practice Skills: This mini soccer goal is perfect for playing short-sided games and practicing your soccer skills out in the backyard
Indoors or outdoors: This set can be used indoors or out in the backyard so you can play all year round
Lightweight and portable: This set is constructed from lightweight quick fold corner joints that fold & lock into place to easily assemble or break down in seconds; The lightweight design makes this goal easy to assemble, move and store in seconds
Folds flat for storage: This goal set folds flat, making it easy to stow and store when not being used
